context: Hello! What kind of movies do you like?
Hello how are you? I like a little bit of everything.
I haven't seen anything like Young Guns (1988) in a long time. Do you know anything similar to that?
Oh yes I have that is also one of my favorites. I love old western movies. They are just so much fun to watch. Another good one is The Good, the Bad and the Ugly (1966) .
entity: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly (1966)
resp: El Dorado (1966) is another great movie!
